monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Age of Purification
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an ally gets an Age stack, remove a harmful Stack from all allies. (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Anti Cascade
skills.description: Reduces enemy damage by 3% for every consecutive hit. (1st hit: 0% reduction, 2nd hit: 3% reduction, 3rd hit: 6% reduction)

skills.name: Apprentice
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Apprentice Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Apprentice Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sidekick & Spellshield (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Arcane Obliteration
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies Removes 2 Buffs from targets

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Cleansing Flame
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (fire) Removes 1 Buff from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (fire) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (fire) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Cleansing Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) magical damage (fire) Removes 3 Buffs from target

skills.name: Cleansing Sidekick
skills.description: Unique Aura: Sidekick hits also remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Concealed
skills.description: During its first round, this Monster has an additional 25% chance to dodge enemy hits.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Apex
skills.description: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Critical Buffs
skills.description: When applying a Buff, there is a chance to also apply 2 Charge stacks, equal to this Monster's Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Healing
skills.description: Healing actions can land a "Critical Heal" to heal for an increased amount, based on Critical Chance and Critical Damage. (Triggering any Crit-based skills)

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Enlightened
skills.description: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Critical Chance also increases the chance to dodge enemy hits by 20% of the value.

skills.name: Full Potential
skills.description: Shield target for 25% of target's Max Health Applies Might, Sorcery, Regeneration, Sidekick, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (60 + 20% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (85 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (100 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (130 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heat Shimmer
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Helping Hand
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (110 + 50% Magic) Applies Sidekick (Buff)

skills.name: Helping Hand Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (150 + 55% Magic) Applies Sidekick & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Max Mana value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, it gains 6 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Multi Sidekick
skills.description: Aura: Sidekick (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Outlast
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gain their first, second, or third Age stack, they also gain a shield equal to 15% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Path to Ascension
skills.description: Aura: When an allied Spirit gets attacked, it has a 75% chance to gain Channel or Regeneration. They can gain an additional stack of those Buffs.

skills.name: Path to Knowledge
skills.description: Aura: When an allied Mage gets attacked, it has a 75% chance to gain Sorcery or Barrier. They can gain an additional stack of those Buffs.

skills.name: Path to Valhalla
skills.description: Aura: When an allied Warrior gets attacked, it has a 75% chance to gain Might or Glory. They can gain an additional stack of those Buffs.

skills.name: Punishment
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an allied Monster removes a Buff from an enemy with an attack, there is a 50% chance the attack deals an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Replenish
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (300 + 50% Magic) Shield all for 2 x (350 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Sidekick
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Whirlpool
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (water) Removes 2 Debuffs from Caster

skills.name: Whirlpool Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (water) Removes 3 Debuffs from Caster

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Craft Box
drops.description: Consume to get random craft materials based on Keeper Rank.

drops.name: Skill Potion
drops.description: Grants a skill point. Can only be consumed once per Monster
